title: minimax capital
author: minimax capital
content: Hello world!On July 1st minimax capital started the first cryptocurrency trading experiment based on state-of-the-art AI techniques.The available capital is 10,000 usd and will be entirely invested in cryptocurrencies.Each operation will be shared and a monthly report will analyze the performance with respect to the main indices and commodities.This experiment does not express market beliefs or financial advice.Follow us on social media!
